messages.content: Helen Jordan works with Vincent Smith.
Vincent Smith is a colleague of Frank Hughes.
Frank Hughes works with Douglas Edwards.
Douglas Edwards is a colleague of Susan Kelly.
Susan Kelly works with Joshua Cox.
Joshua Cox is a colleague of Adam Ross.
Adam Ross works with Bobby Tran.
Bobby Tran is a colleague of Denise Jackson.
Denise Jackson works with Sharon Stewart.
Sharon Stewart is a colleague of Joan Rivera.

queries.question: Are Helen Jordan and Joan Rivera related to each other at work through colleagues relations?

reference_answer.text: Yes, they are indirect colleagues according to their graph relations.
